North_Las_Vegas.Jerry's Nugget:
Jerry's Nugget Casino is a casino in North Las Vegas, Nevada, privately owned and operated by the Stamis family, with 24,000 square feet (2,200 m2) of gaming space.
Future developments for Jerry's Nugget include building a hotel on site.


== History ==
Jerry's Nugget was founded in 1964 by Jerry Lodge and Jerry Stamis and was originally the site of the Town House Bar.
